note.p: Death: Fledborough Hall, Holyport, Berkshire (05 December 1930)
Education: Trinity College, Cambridge. BA (1877), MA
Career: Called to the Bar, Lincoln's Inn (1879); published work on hydrodynamics (1888), on physical optics (1892), on cubic and quartic curves (1901) and on geometry of surfaces (1910)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1931 vol 131 pp i-ii signed by H L
References: Lawrence Badash, 'British and American Views of the German Menace in World War I' in NR 1979-80 vol 34 pp 91-121
